title: Uncle Si Got Heckled in NYC
description:
Si cracks up at the strange experiences he had last time he visited New York. Martin shares a highly amusing story about taking Godwin's measurements. The boys laugh at the Robertsons' track record with political endorsements. Stone gets access to Willie's meat stash and holds nothing back in his assessment of people who like their meat well done. John-David has finally learned not to second guess Si — especially on his knowledge of sharks. And the boys offer advice to a girl whose dad revoked his blessing for her upcoming marriage.
-
